info.title: Laravel API Starter
info.description: A modern RESTful API starter kit built with Laravel, featuring authentication, roles, permissions, and comprehensive documentation. The API provides endpoints for user management, authentication, social login, and role-based access control.

get.description: Returns a list of all roles with their permissions

post.description: Creates a new role with optional permissions

get.description: Returns the specified role details including permissions

put.description: Updates a specific role's name and permissions

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users
Returns the specified user details including roles and permissions

put.description: Updates a specific user's information and roles

message.example: You cannot delete your own account.

post.description: Returns user data and access token
Returns user data and access token

message.example: Too many login attempts. Please try again in 60 seconds.

post.description: Invalidates the user's current access token
Invalidates the current token and issues a new one
Sends a password reset link to the specified email address

message.example: We have emailed your password reset link!

400.description: Invalid email or error sending link

message.example: We can't find a user with that email address.

post.description: Reset the user's password using the token from the password reset email

400.description: Invalid token or error resetting password

message.example: This password reset token is invalid.
The password confirmation does not match.

get.description: Returns authenticated user profile data including roles and permissions

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile picture

bearerAuth.description: Use a JWT token to access this API. You can obtain a token through the login or register endpoints.

tags.name: User Profile
tags.description: API Endpoints for user profile management

tags.name: Admin Users
tags.description: API Endpoints for user management (admin only)

tags.name: Admin Roles
tags.description: API Endpoints for role management (admin only)

tags.name: Password Reset
tags.description: API Endpoints for password reset functionality
